promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute epic cat fighting-type pokemon wearing a stone crystal headband. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Battlystic, a a chibi cute epic cat fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Heavy Impact. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "fighting" or "Battlystic". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, cat-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Utilizing its Heavy Impact, this playful gladiator thrives in competition arenas. A charismatic furball, stealthily honing skills daily.
